about_the_game:
The Pato Box Original Soundtrack is an 80-minute ride of our hero’s fight against Deathflock. Ranging from themes that represent the backstory of each boss to the heroic moments of Pato Box’s victories against the corrupted system he lives in, the soundtrack has an important role in narrating Pato Box's bout against Deathflock's vile plans.

All music was composed by Controvol with an additional track from guest artist Vangal played in the credits section of the game.

The DLC includes the Pato Box Original Soundtrack in both MP3 and WAV format, and an exclusive cover and back cover art made by the creator of Pato Box.

All tracks will be placed in your Pato Box folder in the Steam Directory:
Windows -> ...Steam\steamapps\common\Pato Box\Pato Box Original Soundtrack [Digital Release]
Mac -> "~/Library/Application Support/Steam/steamapps/common/Pato Box/Pato Box Original Soundtrack [Digital Release]"

Tracks included:

01. Prologue
02. Timing
03. Explorer (Journeyman)
04. Faith
05. Ode to the System
06. System Failure
07. Deathflock
08. Toxicology
09. Ornithology
10. Duck Sauce
11. Paté de Foie Gras
12. Patology
13. Duck Test
14. Marauder
15. Temporada de Patos (The Hunt)
16. Ugly Duckling
17. All in
18. Upper Hand
19. Rope-a-Dope
20. 'Bout Time
21. Ballad of Faith
22. Pleased to Meet You
23. Duck and Cover
24. Pato Loco
25. Qualm
26. Vangal - Au Revoir (Instrumental)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Yosemite
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Pato Box Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro Graphics 6200
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews:
“Pato Box's one truly flawless element is its amazing score.”
Destructoid

“The dark electronic soundtrack completes the ambience with strong and catchy rhythms”
Vandal
short_description: The Pato Box Original Soundtrack is an 80-minute ride of our hero’s fight against Deathflock. The DLC includes the Pato Box Original Soundtrack in both MP3 and WAV format, and an exclusive cover and back cover art made by the creator of Pato Box.
